column5: We have a cozy 1st floor bedroom in our 3 story town home by Baldwin Park in Midtown. The room has a queen bed and a mounted flatscreen with HBO GO, Netflix, and Amazon. There's a full bathroom reserved for guests. Safe, quiet, and it's a 10 minute walk to the rail!  We can be sometimes flexible with the check-in & check-out times, especially in the weekends. If you have a question, please message us!
column8: 1st Floor Private Room, Walk to Rail, HBO-GO
